ComicInfo.Summary:
Harlan Ellison's Dream Corridor is a comic book series published by Dark Horse Comics. All of the stories are adapted from works originally written by Harlan Ellison. Each issue includes many pages of interstitial sequencing written by Ellison, drawn by Eric Shanower, and a new short story by Ellison, written around the cover of each issue. *Story Titles* I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream part 1 by John Byrne Knox by Schutz and Kristiansen Turnpike by Collins and Elliot Midnight In The Sunken Cathedral part 2 (prose) by Ellison I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream part 1 (prose) by Ellison
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/harlan-ellisons-dream-corridor-1-harlan-ellisons-d/4000-249533/
